channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: RFK Jr. Is Compounding the CDC’s Covid Mistakes
item.description: The HHS secretary is substituting one set of unscientific, politically driven priorities for another.

item.title: Ban the Fear, Not the Freedom: Massachusetts Bill Misses the Mark on Nicotine
item.description: In a society of free, autonomous adults, banning nicotine because it offends one legislator’s sensibilities is simply unacceptable.

item.title: Appeals court reinstates FTC commissioner fired by Trump
item.description: A federal appeals court issued a ruling Tuesday restoring Rebecca Slaughter to her post on the Federal Trade Commission, saying President Trump's move...

item.title: Appeals court rules Trump misused Alien Enemies Act against Venezuelan deportees
item.description: A federal appeals court issued a searing rebuke to President Trump late Tuesday, ruling that he overstepped his deportation powers when he used a cent...

item.title: New Classical College Welcomes Back War Hero Professor After Resolved Visa Snafu
item.description: While Harold Ristau's new professorship was not part of the college's original budget for this year, the trustees unanimously approved the position.

item.title: No One Is Talking About The Direct Pipeline From Divorced Parents To School Shooters
item.description: Like so many other school shooters, the Minneapolis shooter's parents divorced in 2013, when we was around age 12.

item.title: Starmer’s Regime Just Lit The Fuse On The U.K.’s Free Speech Crisis
item.description: Popular Irish sitcom writer Graham Linehan was arrested in London Monday after expressing anti-transgender opinions on X.

item.title: Sen. Cory Booker announces engagement to girlfriend Alexis Lewis
item.description: Sen. Cory Booker of New Jersey is getting married.

item.title: Here Are Three Ways Americans Can Fight The U.K.’s Orwellian Attempts To Suppress Free Speech
item.description: The arrest of beloved comedian Graham Linehan for criticizing the transgender movement makes it clear that the U.K. is becoming a police state.

item.title: David French Will Say Anything For A Paycheck
item.description: David French's schtick is too obvious now to pretend he’s doing anything but a 'real conservative' minstrel show for pay.

item.title: Republican senators to talk up wins of Trump's D.C. crime-fighting push

item.title: Mamdani to headline Sen. Sanders' 'Fighting Oligarchy' event
item.description: Sen. Bernard Sanders, the Godfather of the modern liberal movement, is headed to New York this weekend to join forces with Zohran Mamdani, the front-r...

item.title: Government by Emergency Is a Bad Idea
item.description: The presidency doesn’t need any more discretionary power.

item.title: Sorry, Democrats: Rural Hospitals Aren’t at Risk from Trump’s Reforms
item.description: Far from endangering rural hospitals, President Trump and Republicans in Congress are helping them by fixing a broken Medicaid system.

item.title: Our Two-Party System Isn’t Going Anywhere
item.description: Elon Musk’s America Party is the latest third-party dream to die.
